title: Kosciuszko National Park Alpine Lodge with Three-Day Lift Pass, Oversnow Transfers & Daily Breakfast
description: Tucked high in snowbound Charlotte Pass - Australia's oldest ski resort - this home base is the perfect retreat between days spent exploring the mountain. With included three-day lift passes per person and oversnow transfers from Perisher Valley Skitube Terminal, you're guaranteed an incredible winter experience in the heart of Kosciuszko National Park. Cosy rooms look out over the mountains, while mornings are fuelled with a continental spread of pastries. Beyond the lodge, guests have access to the resort's facilities, including five bars and restaurants for a perfect spot of apres-ski.
offer_address: 1 Kosciuszko Road, Charlotte Pass, New South Wales 2624, Australia
